summary: Dubious Bounty Killer Hank Fellows tracks bank stage coaches to observe them being robbed. Only afterwards does he move in on the bandits to collect his reward. The manager of the Omaha ... See full summary »
cast: Craig Hill|George Martin|Piero Lulli|Fernando Sancho|Franco Ressel|George Wang|Diana Martín|Eugenio Galadini|Rada Rassimov|José Marco|Lorenzo Robledo|Sancho Gracia|José Canalejas|José Manuel Martín|Dario De Grassi|Enrique Santiago|Frank Braña|Olga Karlatos
title: Cazador de recompensas
